meanings.definition: A game played with wooden pins or balls
meanings.sent1: We played skittles at the park with our friends.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed playing skittles during recess.
meanings.sent3: The skittles game got competitive as everyone tried to knock down the pins.
meanings.sent4: In the skittles game of life, sometimes you have to aim carefully to hit your target.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the skittles falling echoed through the room.

meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the skittles in the candy store.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of skittles filled the room.
